FileJump alternative
HeroSection.description:
Switch to Internxt for a fully private alternative to FileJump. Post-quantum and
 zero-knowledge encrypted cloud storage.

HeaderSection.title: Internxt vs FileJump overview
HeaderSection.description: Discover the key features and differences that allow Internxt to give you back control over your data.

internxtFeatures: Competitive, no hidden costs, up to 5TB
Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, Mail, and more
GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, SOC 2 compliant, based in Spain
competitorFeatures: More expensive plans and less storage, up to 2TB
Files are not fully end-to-end encrypted
Based in India, so Indian compliance laws apply

PrivacyViolationsSection.title: FileJump lacks transparency. Internxt protects your privacy.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: FileJump keeps its source code hidden and has no published security audits. Users report that filenames and file contents can be returned in plain text. Switch to Internxt for full security and transparency for your files, videos, and photos. With Internxt, nobody but you can access your files, not even us.

descriptions: FileJump keeps its source code hidden from the public. With no transparency or independent security audit, there is no way to know for sure how FileJump handles or protects your data.
Unlike Internxt, FileJump has not published any independent security audits, leaving users uncertain about the security of their platform.

Not all files on FileJump are protected with end-to-end encryption. Users inspecting the code report that filenames and even file contents can be returned in plain text, making it hard to fully trust the provider.

Being based in India, FileJump must follow local laws, including data-access and storage regulations. This has raised concerns among users about surveillance, government requests, and limited transparency.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private FileJump alternative
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What FileJump demonstrates in basic security fails in terms of complete privacy and transparency. For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption for all your files from Internxt.

descriptions: Not all files on FileJump are protected with end-to-end encryption. Users report that filenames and file contents can be returned in plain text. At Internxt, all your files are protected with zero-knowledge encryption by default, with no trackers, no AI scanning, and no hidden backdoors.

Users have raised concerns that files may not be fully encrypted with FileJump, contradicting what the service claims. Internxt provides automatic post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption for all files, ensuring your data is always protected.

Without open source code or audits, you can't be sure how FileJump handles your data, if there are backdoors to your data, or if any security vulnerabilities exist. Choosing a service that is fully open source and audited like Internxt gives you verified protection and peace of mind.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs FileJump
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unparalleled security with features that FileJump can't match, such as verified zero-knowledge encryption for all files, post-quantum encryption, and open-source transparency.

features.title: Open source
features.description: Internxt's code is open for everyone to examine and ensure its security via our GitHub. This transparency guarantees that no vulnerabilities are hidden.

features.title: Zero-knowledge encryption
features.description: Your data is encrypted on the client side, guaranteeing that only you can access it.

features.title: Audited & compliant
features.description: Internxt has been externally audited and complies with GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, and SOC 2.

features.title: Lifetime plans
features.description: Avoid repeated subscriptions with a one-time payment for plans up to 5TB. Access our services forever for {{percentage}}% off.

features.title: Closed source
features.description: FileJump keeps its source code hidden from the public. With no transparency or independent security audit, there is no way to know for sure how FileJump handles or protects your data.

features.title: Privacy concerns
features.description: Users have raised concerns that files may not be fully encrypted. Users inspecting the code report that filenames and even file contents can be returned in plain text.

features.title: No published audits
features.description: FileJump has not published any independent security audits, unlike Internxt which undergoes regular external audits.

features.title: Limited lifetime plans
features.description: Lifetime plans up to 2TB are available at €99.99 annually, with less storage and higher costs than Internxt.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: Why Internxt is the best FileJump alternative
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt Drive offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to give you back control of your online privacy.

descriptions:
Internxt Drive comes with post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption, so nobody but you can access your files. Get encrypted cloud storage and backups for your photos, videos, and files. 

 Plus, encrypted backups and password-protected file sharing offer maximum protection against ransomware and data breaches.

Internxt Antivirus is built directly into your Internxt Drive app for full control and protection against malware. Run full or custom virus scans to keep your device running smoothly and protected against viruses such as ransomware or spyware.

Internxt's VPN protects your browsing, blocks ads and trackers, and keeps your location private. Encrypt your wifi connection to prevent spying, hackers, and identity theft. Surf securely knowing your personal information, passwords, and accounts are protected.

Internxt Cleaner helps you identify, eliminate, and manage unwanted junk or duplicate files from your device. With Cleaner, you can delete unwanted files to keep your storage organized, free from clutter, and ensure your device runs efficiently.

Internxt Meet is also available as your secure and private alternative to video conferencing. With Meet, you can host private video calls free from trackers, ads, and data collection. Your video calls are protected with post-quantum encryption, allowing you to host calls in total privacy.

Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile, Internxt lets you take total control of your cloud storage by accessing your cloud from anywhere, on any device. For advanced users, Internxt offers support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS, offering everything you need to manage your files in total privacy.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure alternative to FileJump?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files. All your files are protected with this encryption, without the need to store them in a separate vault, as Internxt Drive serves as your full encrypted cloud storage vault.

Additional features such as VPN, Antivirus, Device Cleaner, NAS support, Meet, and Mail also offer you additional protection from hackers and data breaches as part of your cloud storage plan with Internxt.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure alternative to FileJump.
This cryptography method is used by Internxt to ensure that your lifetime cloud storage plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all plans at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict laws to ensure your data and privacy are protected.

faq.question: Is FileJump more expensive than Internxt?
answer: FileJump costs €99.99 annually for 2TB of cloud storage. With Internxt, you can get 5TB of post-quantum encrypted storage, plus VPN, Antivirus, Meet, Mail, and more for €56.62 for the first year. You can also avoid subscription costs by choosing a lifetime Internxt plan to get full privacy forever.
With your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, Internxt offers cloud storage and an extensive range of features not available with any other cloud provider, including FileJump.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, requests, or need assistance, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account if you need to add more storage. Or purchase a new plan at internxt.com/pricing with your current Internxt account, and your storage will be automatically stacked.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Yes, Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
